page.title: 03HOLT TOWN TODAY-continued
page.content: FARNDON WAS BUILT IN 1300 AND IS NOW 685 YEARS OLD.THE BRIDGE HAS 8 ARCHES. IN THE PAST PEOPLE HAD TO PAY TO CROSS IT.BUT NOW IT IS VERY OLD AND THEY ARE BUILDING A NEW ONE FURTHER DOWN THE RIVER.THERE IS ALSO GOING TO BE A NEW BY-PASS. THE OLD SCHOOL IS STILL STANDING AND IS BEING MADE INTO COTTAGES.THE NEW SCHOOL IS LARGER AND ITS LIBRARY WAS OFFICIALLY OPENED IN MAY THIS YEAR. THERE ARE TWO LARGE ESTATES IN HOLT WHICH ARE:- 1. DEE PARK-APPROX.60 HOUSES 2. SMITHFIELD GREEN-APPROX.30 HOUSES ALTHOUGH HOLT IS CLASSED AS A TOWN IT IS IN FACT STILL VERY SMALL AND RURAL COMPARED WITH WREXHAM WITH ITS LARGE DEPARTEMENT STORES AND VARIED FACILITIES i.e SWIMMING BATHS,etc.
